definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)

sentences.english: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. ---E. Roosevelt.
sentences.chinese: 未來屬於那些堅信他們夢中之美的人們。

sentences.english: God, that was a beautiful sight.
sentences.chinese: 上帝，那是一幅多美的景色。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the relationship between the truth perfect, beautiful life principle and university education.
sentences.chinese: 論述了求真求善求美的人生理念與大學教育的關係。

sentences.english: The last part is an analysis of the grandness-orientation in aesthetics.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分則對漢賦以大爲美的價值取向進行了分析。

sentences.english: Therefore, it should conform to the nature and be esthetical.
sentences.chinese: 它應該是符合大自然的，也必須是美的。

sentences.english: The news photograph can not only acquire information, and can also get beautiful enjoyment.
sentences.chinese: 新聞照片不但可以獲得信息，而且還能得到美的享受。

sentences.english: They're not just beautiful, but strangely beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 他們不只是美的，而且是奇怪的美。

sentences.english: Liu Cixin's writing evokes the thrill of exploration and the beauty of scale.
sentences.chinese: 劉慈欣的作品喚起了人們對探索和宏觀之美的興奮感。

sentences.english: The next morning when the sun was in the sky, she discovered something beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 第二天一早，太陽出來了，她發現一些極美的東西。

sentences.english: Secondly, making a further study of space-time condition of Confucius' Neutralization and Harmony.
sentences.chinese: 其次，進一步分析了孔子中和之美的時間與空間條件。

sentences.english: Chuang Tsu stresses on the natural principle of 'Tao' and the regulative character of the beauty.
sentences.chinese: 莊子強調了“道”的自然性原則和美的合規律的特點。

sentences.english: It was a beautiful watch, on a long, thin, gold watchband .
sentences.chinese: 那是很美的手錶，繫着一條又長又薄的金錶帶。

sentences.english: Like the MM let beans are usually now your food list.
sentences.chinese: 喜歡美的MM無妨讓豆類常呈現在你的食物清單上。

sentences.english: A wilderness, remote non-life, in the eyes of photographers is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 一片荒野，渺無生機，在攝影家的眼裏是美的。

sentences.english: I spend a lot of time thinking and thinking up new and more beautiful robes for you.
sentences.chinese: 我花了很多時間不斷爲您構思更新更美的王袍。

sentences.english: Wine is not only happy enjoyment for people but also good for peoples health.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄酒不僅能給人以美的享受，還有益於人體健康。

definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
Homei town in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
good-looking/nice-looking/good (of a movie, book, TV show etc)/embarrassed/humiliated
